title: My ping
body: Alright so heres my deal. whenever the internet is being used i lag in LOL but im using ethernet :/   We have another computer on wifi ands its running the exact same way. What could be causing lag? Btw i'm on mac.......

replies.body: Do you mean whenever *someone else* is using your network while you're playing League, you encounter latency (ping) issues and delays in your abilities?

Can you check to see that when someone else is using your network, they aren't doing things like streaming video or downloading large files, as these commonly cause issues for online games that result in high latency or disconnections.
youtube and netfilx/and others are on  a lot

Streaming content on those sites uses **a ton of [bandwidth](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bandwidth_(computing))**. You may need to contact your ISP (Internet Service Provider) about ensuring your equipment and plan can provide the bandwidth required for your usage. Additionally, you may be able to ask them about setting up [QoS (Quality of Service)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quality_of_service) to ensure your computer has network priority over other devices on the network.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
